resources.string: Yoosee is a charge-free APP custom-made for the new generation of smart home appliance. It adopts the advanced Cloudlink P2P network transmission technology. Remote monitoring can be realized so simply, letting you care about your families and friends at any time everywhere.
Account No. already exists in the shielding list
Alarm sending account is your APP account
ID number shall not contain more than 9 characters
Device ID shall not contain more than 9 characters
Are you sure to empty the recent call records?
Are you sure to empty it?
The current device is the latest edition
The current device doesn\'t support defence area
Download failed; click to move it.
The mailbox name shall contain 3~32 characters
Obtain mobile phone verification code too frequently. Please try later.
Do not receive alarm information within xx Sec.
Please enter the alarm device account No.
Please enter the alarm sending account
Please enter the new administor password
Please enter the old administor password
Please enter your mobile phone number
Please enter your mobile phone number
Account and password can\'t be empty
Please enter the mobile phone verification code
Click yes to trigger the wireless sensor
Revising network may cause disconnection of device. Please confirm the operation!
The password is successfully modified. Please log on again.
The current network is not available. Please check your network setting.
Original password shall not contain more than 10 characters
The network is busy. Please try later.
Mobile phone number shall be 6-15 characters
Mobile phone verification code sent to
The starting time shall be earlier than the end time
Dialog error; your account may be logged on in other place; please log on again
After the device is shielded, the device alarm message will not be received. You can cancel the shielding in alarm setting.
The current version is the latest
Your APP won\'t receive the alarm information of the following device
Press again to exit the play
Press again to exit the call
Press again to exit from monitoring
Guest password shall not contain more than 9 characters
Device password shall be digit combination and shall not start with 0
It\'s still empty! You need to add equipment to watch the video. Get started now~
Please connect your phone with wireless network first
Wait for the device to connect Wi-Fi
Your wireless network needs password authentication!
1. Mobile phone and device not in the same LAN \n 2. device connection to WiFi failed
2. Device not successfully connected to Wi-Fi
Try to add by scanning 2D code
Please aim the camera at the 2D code with a distance of 20-30cm, till you hear a ting. Hear it?
The number of alarm receivers has reached the top limit
Please aim your camera at the 2D code till you hear a ting.
Empty SD card? By doing so, you will lose all the data stored in the card!
Surplus capacity of USB flash disk:
Till you hear a ting. Can you hear it?
Camera needs to connect to WIFI
Power on and wait for the camera to give out the connection cue tone \n if no connection cue tone is heard, please reset the camera
Please wait patiently. Going to be connected successfully

Probable causes: 
1. Incorrect wifi password is entered 
2. The camera doesn't support 5G network 
3. The current network environment is poor
The device doesn\'t support this operation.
Too frequent operations. The previous operation is not completed.
3. The current network environment is poor.
Too simple device password. The new password must be 6~10 characters containing letters and digits.
Mailbox not verified; please ensure the mailbox SMTP service is available!
Receive no alarm from this device any more
Check the box and the addresser and addressee will be the same person.
Please enter SMTP address; if there are more addresses, please separate them with comma
There shall be no more than 3 addressees
The number of addresser shall not be more than 1
There shall be no more than 5 SMTP addresses
No mailbox bound, no need to clear
The password shall at least contain 8 characters
Please enter the new WiFi password
1. Device will ting and restart after successful modification \n 2. APP will return to Device list after restart \n 3. Try to connect using new password after the Device is found
Too simple password. The new password must be 6~30 characters containing letters and digits.
The new password must be 6 ~ 30 characters composed of letters and digits
Please switch the mobile phone network
Please check the mobile phone network!
The system is being maintained. Please try later.
Put the 2D code in the box to scan automatically.
Please scan the 2D code on the sensor
The master is at home. No disturbance
The master goes out to work. Leave it to me.
The master is resting at home, silence mode
At most 15 sensors can be added
There shall be no more than six time blocks
Please turn up the mobile phone sound and keep it 30cm from the device.
Please confirm the device is waiting for connection
Please use a pin to thrust the Reset hole on the bottom or at the back of the device, till the device gives out cue tone
Please connect your phone to Wi-Fi
Please enter the memory point name
Adding of memory point prohibited under such state
The number added has reached the limit
The starting time and end time shall not be the same
Starting time can\'t exceed end time
The host name can\'t be empty
Domain name length out of range
The changed name is the same as the former one
Please enter the correct mobile phone number
Light controlled by automatic light sensing
Please enter field name or IP address
Name already exists in the list
Find back the mobile phone number
Confirm the password can\'t be empty
Password can\'t be less than three characters
Please obtain the verification code first
\n Password can\'t be found back using mobile phone in this country now, \n you can use your mailbox to find back the password. Thanks!
Find back the mobile phone number
PIR will function when device has defence
Try to keep the mobile phone and device within 5m from the router
Infrared sensor of the human body
Scan the QR Code to add NVR
Searching can be connected to the camera
User name doesn\'t exceed over 26 bits
Do not leave empty mobile number or email address
Enter password 6-18 bits, including letters & numbers
Please set password comprising numbers & letters in 6-30 bits
An email has been sent to your email address, password can be retrieved there.
Please select at least one file
Prepare camera, switch on power, \n connect camera port to router LAN port using network cable
What requirement on WiFi does camera have?
it releases prompt tone for connection
No devices I want to add
Initial device password is often shown on the back/bottom lebal
You have not obtained the verification code supplied
Unsuccessfully sending verification code via email
Firmware upgrading, anout 1 minute needed, please do not power off
No storage card inserted into your camera
Please replug in the inserted storage card when it is not identified
Please use storage card in FAT32 format
1. Device temporarily access to 4G WiFi, instead of 5G WiFi
2. Device temporarily not support WPA/WPA2 enterprise-level WiFi
3. Router WiFi SSID cannot be concealed
4. Router cannot enable access restriction options like AP segregation, anti-rub network
1. Please confirm that the device is not connected with network cable
2. Please confirm that device power is being normally connected
To slightly insert reset hole using thimble until reset prompt tone is heard, await about 30 sec. when connection prompt tone is given off
Device not saved, give up adding camera?
Are you sure to exit adding camera?
Keep a 30cm distance away from camera
1. Please confirm that the device is open and power is on
2. Please confirm that the device is connected with network cable
3. Please confirm that the device and the handset share the same router
Are you sure to give up adding camera?
Are you sure there is no WiFi password?
Please make sure the device is online
Abnormal TF card requests formatting, format immediately?
Congratulations on adding completed. Please set up WiFi in network setup.
Camera is receiving/connecting WiFi, \n about 1-2 minutes needed for connecting, please await patiently
Please create(and memorize) a device password in 6-30 bits comprising letters and numbers
3. Current environment is more noisy and affecting sonic wave
Exit from AP mode or not?
Find AP device, enter or not?
Account is invalid, please re-register it.
